thread.title: Someone Went Back And Dug Up All Of Eddie Lacy’s Old Tweets Professing His Love For ‘China Food’
thread.title_full: Someone Went Back And Dug Up All Of Eddie Lacy’s Old Tweets Professing His Love For ‘China Food’

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Someone Went Back And Dug Up All Of Eddie Lacy’s Old Tweets Professing His Love For ‘China Food’
text:
Embed from Getty Images 
Former Green Bay Packers RB Eddie Lacy, who has ballooned to over 270lbs in the offseason has signed a one-year contract with the Seattle Seahawks. 
Lacy’s current contract includes a insane weight bonus that is valued at over $350k if he can keep his weight in check. 
Eddie Lacy's contract with Seahawks includes $385,000 bonus tied to his weight, $2.865M guaranteed: https://t.co/99syTYMkG5 
— Sheil Kapadia (@SheilKapadia) March 15, 2017 

If Lacy wants to keep the weight down he’s going to have avoid eating all that “China Food” he tweets about all the time. 
presenting the most dangerous one-two punch in the NFL: Eddie Lacy and china food pic.twitter.com/X0Oa8kNyiH 
— Grant Goldberg (@GrantGoldberg) March 10, 2017 






H/T Daily Snark
